00016 W.events = {};

00040 W.event = function(source, evt, func, arg1){
00041   var task;
00042   // create a new library for this object if there no exist yet.
00043   if(!W.events[source])
00044     W.events[source] = {};
00045   if(!W.events[source][evt]){
00046     // create a new library for this event if there no exist yet.
00047     W.events[source][evt] = [];
00048     // extend the original event handler
00049     source[evt] = function(){
00050       // execute reserved tasks
00051       for(var i = 0; i < W.events[source][evt].length; ++i){
00052         task = W.events[source][evt][i];
00053         // BUG: Error on firefox, onresize
00054         task[0](task[1]);
00055       }
00056     };
00057   }
00058   W.events[source][evt][W.events[source][evt].length] = [func, arg1];
00059 };
